version_description:
- improved water block
- small bugs fixes
- network and 3D rendering optimization

HUGE LONG-AWAITED UPDATE. Do not forget to follow us on Twitter and like our page on Facebook to stay in touch with upcoming updates and features:
In this update: chunk rentals, better navigation and HUD highlighting, better chat, new skins and many more. All of the details are below:

- We have implemented NEW and EXCITED functionality where you can now rent your own pieces of the Planet – chunks!

- One chunk is square area of 16 x 16 blocks and 256 blocks of height

- Rent as many chunks as you want! Only you can modify your own chunks until their rental is not expired!

- Blocks removal speed is 3 times quicker on your own chunks.

- Watch out chunk rentals expiration and prolong your rentals - otherwise someone else can rent your chunks after they have expired

- The game now has 2 modes: "show my chunks" mode and "hide my chunks" mode. When you turn on "show my chunks" mode the entire Planet of Cubes is shown in grey color except your own chunks

- Get notifications when some of your chunk rentals expire

- See all available chunks around you any time using “Rent Chunk” menu

- Name, teleport or delete your own chunks in the My Chunks screen.

- Unlimited number of teleports to your own chunks

HUD highlights:
- RED: you can’t build here. You are either in Spawn Zone or on the chunks that belongs to other user
- WHITE: you can build here but your changes will roll back soon
- GREEN: your own chunk, only you can build here until its rental not expired

- See directions out of the spawn zone in order to start building

- Controls improvement. Added option for horizontal movement.

- Chat improvement. You can now show/hide or clear chat contents any time

LIKE US: https://www.facebook.com/planetofcubes/

Minor fixes and improvements to the previous HUGE update to the version 2.0:

-NEW icon
-This version can now work with both 256 cubes height and 128 cubes height Planet of Cubes (we will soon release new Planet(s) with 128 cubes height for faster 3D rendering and networking performance)
-Updated colors of the remaining rental time for better visuals in the “MY CHUNKS” windows
-Updated color of the Spawn Zones in the “RENT CHUNKS” window
-Now you are proposed to buy exact amount of missing coins to rent selected chunks
-Fixed bugs with empty “MY CHUNKS” list window
-Various UI fixes and improvements

New version with good new features and important fixes:

- Added Chat Parental Control feature. Dear parents, now you can password protect chat for your children!

- Help button on the main screen now shows Game Tutorial using cartoon images - easy and fun learning how to play the game!

- Added tutorial cartoons on the Planet loading screen

- View Distance now automatically reduces after last crash to save memory on slow devices. You can change View Distance in the OPTIONS->GRAPHICS AND SOUND screen

- Improved chat window resize functionality. You can now free up more space for your building needs whilst keeping chat window in screen.

- Improved RENT CHUNKS and Inventory screens

- Added More Info button [ ? ] at the left top of the main screen

- Scroll and zoom optimization of the MAP of the Planet

- Fixed Cancel button problem when loading the Planet

- Fixed minor bugs in Shop, Take Screenshot and RENT CHUNKS screens

- Ability to Teleport to any chunk from RENT CHUNKS window using ‘long press’

- Removed e-mail field from chat parental control to simplify setup

- Removed login via Facebook screen from the start

- Added ability to teleport unlimited amount of times on the map

- Updated tips how to play the game

- Updated skins, removed old ones and added some new

- Numerous UI improvements

- Fixed problems with hollow keyboard on certain devices

FINALLY: Long awaited SURVIVAL Multiplayer Mode! Stay tuned for exciting upcoming updates.

HUGE update with tons of new features and new game mode - SURVIVAL MULTIPLAYER:

- Survive on the infinite Planet made of villages and realms
- Protect your creations by fighting with hostile players
- Unlimited players worldwide to survive together
- Use online chat to make new friends and survive together!
- Added mobs in Survival Multiplayer mode (Chicken, Cow, Pig, Rabbit, Sheep, Spider, Zombie) with variety of textures and animations
- Watch out hostile mobs (Zombie, Spider)
- Added Food, Hunger and Regenerating player features
- Added variety of food recipes (Bread, Melon, Mushroom Stew, Sugar, Pumpkin Pie)
- Mine resources. Find diamonds and gold.
- Craft tools, weapon, armor to protect from aggressive mobs and hostile players
- Added New Armor. You can now craft leather armor after you get leather from certain mobs
- Ability to craft and use Furnace to produce more advanced blocks like glass or iron
- Use Portals between nearby realms to find more resources
- Added “Field of View” setting for easier combat during fighting with other players
- Added 3 new block texture packs: Modern, Technology and Tron. Select your favorite texture pack from the Options
- Added death messages in chat, Fixed chat resize
- New recipes and blocks added Furnace and Workbench
- Added flowing water and lava. Added Empty Bucket and Cauldron to use it!
- Corrected the size of Weapons, and blocks
- Improved fight mode
- Improved multiplayer performance
- Fixed bug with Trapdoor
- Fixed connection logic, and loading process
- Fixed logic of using blocks, and their graphics
- Fixed inventory bugs
- Fixed Chunk Rent mini map
- Fixed bugs with rendering
- Fixed bug with incorrect FOV in creative mode
- Fixed sounds playback
- Fixed player’s and mob’s highlighter
- Localization update

HUGE update of the SURVIVAL MULTIPLAYER mode:

- Added 3-d Person Camera View. Now you can see you own skin while playing the game! You can select different camera view modes in the Options!
- Added new mobs to the Survival Multiplayer Mode: Skeleton, Slime, and Creeper
- Implemented long-awaited TNT explosions. Now you can blow everything up with TNT blocks!
- Added Flint and Steel and Powder items
- Added Shooting mechanics to game - Bow, Arrows and Snowball
- Added Brewing and Potions. Now you can cook a potion and improve your skills and gaming experience
- Added New Tutorial Tips for Survival Multiplayer Mode
- Added Animal Breeding. Now you can make mobs follow you (love mode)
- Added New items: Blaze Rod, Slimeball, Nether Wart, Glowstone Dust, Redstone, Fermented Spider Eye, Magma Cream, Sugar, Glistering Melon, Spider Eye, Ghast Tear, Blaze Powder, Golden Carrot, Pufferfish, Rabbit's Foot, Gunpowder
- Implemented Unique Nicknames for everyone
- Game now supports IPv6 Networks
- Changed Mobs physical model
- Added New Spider appearance
- Added Pumpkin and pumpkin armor view
- Added NEW food items Golden Apple and Beetroot
- New option "Restore defaults"
- New Player and Mobs animations
- Changed inventory usage logic, Refactor Inventory view
- Changed Item drop rules
- Changed chunks rendering logic, Player model rendering - improved performance
- Changed light spreading in water
- Improved fight mode and damage visualization
- Improved Death camera messages and view
- Fixed problem with light and illumination
- Fixed bugs in tutorial
- Fixed mobs physics
- Fixed problems with block digging
- Fixed textures rendering
- Fixed Rent chunk feature
- Fixed Split control feature

HUGE SURVIVAL MULTIPLAYER update:

- Added FRIENDS List feature. Now you can make your own friends and chat with them privately!
- Added ability to teleport to any friend instantly
- Implemented Chat messages filter by languages and countries
- Added Players List button to HUD. Now you can see the list of all players around you
- Added Third-Person Camera View, TNT Explosions, Bow/Arrows, Brewing and Potions
- Improved Range weapons usage: Bow, arrows and Snowball (Added Bow durability), added possibility to throw eggs
- Added Fight mode Cooldown
- Added Bone meal
- Added new skins for some mobs
- Items movement animations improvement
- Sneak mode improvement. Added player animation in Sneak Mode
- Added Fancy Graphics option for powerful devices
- Added Deselect Item feature in creative
- Updated Spawn zone logic, Change Spawn Zone Highlighter and status messages
- Added Smooth graphics feature, Realistic Shadows and render improvements
- Improved rendering of the world
- Fixed bugs in Tutorial
- Fixed Restore defaults option
- Fixed death messages and death camera view visualization improved
- Fog rendering issues fixed
- Mobs behavior and AI improvements

- Added Weather (Rain, Snow, Thunder)
- Added Splash Potions
- Added ability to cultivate Huge Mushrooms
- Added Private Chest in Spawn Zones
- Added new enemy: Witch
- Added new enemy: Husk Zombie
- Added new Chain Armor (dropped from Zombies and Skeletons)
- Added Charged Creeper
- Added Dead Bush
- Added Double Plants
- Improved enemy 3d-model (added head rotation)
- Added falling blocks (Sand, Gravel)
- Added new Slime Block. That can be used to bounce on!
- Added new food block: Cake
- Now you can share your rented chunks with your friends
- Added ignore functionality to the chat
- Added volume clouds in fancy graphic mode
- Buddy List improvements
- Fixed problems with disconnects. Added automatic network reconnection!

Hurry up to download an EXHILARATING update with new OFFLINE game modes : Survival SINGLEPLAYER and Creative SINGLEPLAYER! Tons of new excited features: NEW MOBS, TAMING, Splash Potions, Chain Armor, Bone Meal, Fire and More! Stay tuned for exciting upcoming updates.

+ Added SINGLEPLAYER Survival and Creative
+ Added New Main Menu UI
+ Added 2 new passive mobs: Wolf and Ocelot
+ Added 4 new hostile mobs: Enderman, Witch, Husk Zombie, Charged Creeper
+ Tame WOLF with a Bone
+ Tame OCELOT with a Fish
+ Be careful! ENDERMAN attacking in the dark places!
+ WITCH drops splash potions! Fight!
+ HUSK ZOMBIE not burning on the sun
+ CHARGED CREEPER explodes hard
+ Redesigned Mobs, added amazing AI improvements
+ Redesigned Player model, added cool AI improvements
+ Redesigned All Types of Armor! Enjoy!
+ Added new CHAIN ARMOR (dropped from Zombies and Skeletons)
+ Added FIRE entity: use flint and steel to make a fire!
+ Added SPLASH POTIONS : drop potions on players and mobs now
+ Added BONE MEAL, and LAPIS LAZULI to dye wool
+ Added ability to cultivate HUGE MUSHROOMS
+ Added strong and weak rain
+ Added falling blocks logic to sand and gravel
+ Added many other exited improvement to the game! Download new v4.0 NOW!

Download new exciting update with easier building in CREATIVE ONLINE, more fun in SURVIVAL ONLINE, new mobs and items in SURVIVAL SINGLE PLAYER:

*CREATIVE ONLINE*
- Added automatic rental of CHUNKS for FREE for more days!
- Build on your own chunks together with friends or alone
- Allow/deny access to your chunks for friends from “MY CHUNKS” window

*SURVIVAL ONLINE*
- Added a new mob: GOLEM, which will follow you and guard you!
- See MORE users around you, chat with them and add them as friends
- Improved 3D rendering and network speed

*SURVIVAL SINGLE PLAYER*
- Added new aggressive mobs to the Survival Single player: Zombie Pigman and Silverfish! Be careful on the land and in the water!
- Added Cookies to Survival Single player
- Added dynamic day and night cycle
- Added E-mail authorization! Log in to the game, and connect your game progress to your email!

GET NEW EXCITING features with this update. Stay tuned for even more fun very soon!

*NEW GAME IMPROVEMENTS*
- Now you can send private chat messages even to OFFLINE friends via push notifications!
- Add players to MY FRIENDS even if they are OFFLINE via push notifications!
- Added Third-Person camera view button to HUD! Change camera view distance instantly during game play in both survival and creative modes
- Now you can buy leather ARMOR in the SHOP using coins! More cool items to come….
- Now you can use charged CREEPER to have Zombie and Skeleton drop their Mob Head!
- You can wear Mob Head similar to HELMET ARMOR

*NEW CAULDRON FEATURES*
- now you can fill cauldron with any potion bottles or water!
- if you tap a cauldron that has potion with a normal ARROW it will turn the ARROW into a tipped ARROW with that potion effect!
- 1 dose of potion can tip 16 ARROWS
- Now you can dye (paint) leather ARMOR using cauldron and one of the 16 available Dyes

NEW EXCITING UPDATE! Stay tuned for even more fun very soon!

- Added Daily Bonus! Get back to the game every day and get more and more COINS for FREE!
- Now you can buy Potion of Night Vision in the SHOP using coins! Don’t be afraid of the darkness!
- Decreased rain intensity and frequency for better experience
- Added Third-Person camera view change notifications
- Added ability to change third-person camera view using pinch-to-zoom when playing
- Updated Critical Update Window. Now you can contact us easily in case you can’t update the game!
- New Rate Us Window with better functionality!

HUGE UPDATE with new exciting features! Stay tuned for more!

- Added NEW GAME MODE –PRIVATE MAPS! Now you can create your own survival and creative maps and play with friends.
- When you create new map, you can choose who can join your map and who can modify it: ONLY YOU, EVERYONE or ONLY YOUR FRIENDS!
- Select one from 20 predefined templates for your new private survival or creative maps!
- Removed teleport scrolls in the GLOBAL SURVIVAL MULTIPLAYER MODE.

AMAZING UPDATE with new exciting features!

- Finally added MOBS to Creative Multiplayer mode!
- Added ability to search Private Maps by name
- Added Lucky Blocks in Survival Multiplayer mode. Find and break them to check how lucky you are!
- Added Video Blocks in Multiplayer modes. Find and break Video Blocks to earn FREE coins!
- Added Teleport Map into Survival Mode. Now you can see all realms around you and teleport to any of them with the single click
- Added Wooden Sign and Survival Multiplayer mode. Craft wooden signs and write anything you want on them!
- Added Elytra in the SHOP
- Added Stray Mob to Survival Multiplayer
- Added new mobs to Survival Multiplayer: Camel, Goat, Ostrich and Scorpion!
- Added Baby Ostrich Mob
- Added ability to create and use FIRED arrows in Survival Multiplayer!
- Added ability to set permissions for every friend to Teleport to yourself
- Now you can allow friends to build on your own chunks in Creative Multiplayer mode
- Friends with Away status now displayed with yellow color
- Added Anvil to Creative single player mode
- Added Prismarine to Creative single player mode
- Added Quartz to Creative single player mode
- Added Blaze to Creative single player mode

Amazing Xmas 2018 and New Year 2019 update. Download it now and enjoy great new features today!

- Added achievements in Survival Multiplayer mode! Earn coins by completing every achievement and develop your skills as you progress. Use coins in the new SHOP to survive easier in the global open world!
- Added ability to invite your friends to play with you on the current map and/or mode
- Added Dropper block in Survival Singleplayer mode
- Added Holiday theme in Spawn Zones and game graphics
- Added localization of the game to 4 new languages: Japanese, Chinese, Korean and Sweden
- User Interface improvements
- Network connection improvements
- Minor bug fix and optimizations

Amazing Xmas 2018 and New Year 2019 update. Download it now and enjoy great new features today!

- Added achievements in Survival Multiplayer mode! Earn coins by completing every achievement and develop your skills as you progress. Use coins in the new SHOP to survive easier in the global open world!
- Added ability to invite your friends to play with you on the current map and/or mode
- Added Dropper block in Survival Singleplayer mode
- Added Holiday theme in Spawn Zones and game graphics
- Added localization of the game to 4 new languages: Japanese, Chinese, Korean and Sweden
- User Interface improvements
- Network connection improvements
- Minor bug fix and optimizations

Amazing HALLOWEEN update. Join our Halloween party and invite all your friends to enjoy spooky surprises in the GAME!

- Added new HALLOWEEN section to the SHOP with huge discounts on Halloween items limited time! Get most popular items now with 70% discounts such as: PUMPKIN PIE, HEAD SKELETON, ZOMBIE and SPIDER spawn eggs, FIREBALLS, ELYTRA, POTIONED ARROWS numerous POTIONS and SPLASH POTIONS!
- Added new premium SKIN PACK: HALLOWEEN. Buy any skin from this pack to get unique look in the game and become special!
- Updated Spawn Zones with Halloween theme
- Modified default texture pack to created Halloween atmosphere across the entire game!
- Added Halloween graphical elements to the UI
- Zombie and Skeleton mobs are now spawned with pumpkin head sometimes…
- New Halloween icon

Amazing Xmas and New Year update with tons of new features. Tell all your friends to join our festive season celebration together! Download the Game now and play!

+ Updated Spawn Zones with Christmas and New Year theme
+ Modified default texture pack to create Christmas and New Year atmosphere across the entire game!
+ Added festive graphical elements to the UI
+ New Trader NPC in Christmas skin
+ NEW inventory items logic. Organize your inventory easier:
- Move any item to any slot with a single tap
- Tap and hold to split any stack of items
- Determine the order of all items by yourself for maximum convenience
- Select needless item and tap empty area to drop it
- Move your favorite items from Catalog to Inventory in Creative Mode to build faster
+ NEW 3D models and animations of the Mobs:
- New Zombie mob 3D models. Added various hats for zombies. Updated death animations. Updated zombie armor models. Added numerous variations of zombie models, their skins and heads
- New Iron Golem 3D model
- New Skeleton mob models. Added various wearables for Skeleton mob
- New Creeper mob model
- New Slime mob model
- New Pig and Piglet mob models
+ Added ability to delete user account in the Options
+ Updated Glass Pane logic. Now you can unite glass panes into one window
+ Fixed Redstone torch logic. Updated several Redstone circuits like Rapid Pulsar
+ Improved Elytra flying animation
+ Updated Slab, Trapdoor and Stairs items logic. Now you can put these items on any edge of the blocks
+ Improved players list window
+ Improved selection of items in Furnace and Chest
+ Fixed problems with water logic in Survival single player mode
+ Implemented real dispenser logic in Survival single player mode
+ Increased speed of block digging in the Creative mode for the owners of the map
+ Many fixes and improvements!

Another great update with many new features. Invite all your friends to join our global MMO worlds and play together! Download updated Game now and enjoy!

- Added sprinting ability for the player. Double tap and hold forward button to sprint. You will get hungry faster during sprinting. You can’t sprint if your hunger level is less than 30%
- Added sprint-swimming ability for the player. Double tap and hold forward button to sprint-swim when you are under water
-Sprinting and sprint-swimming works in Creative Multiplayer mode without any restrictions
- Added action buttons for various mobs and entities:
+ Feed: Camel, Camel Baby, Sheep, Lamb, Chicken, Chick, Rabbit, Rabbit baby, Pig, Piglet, Ostrich, Ostrich baby, Goat, Cow, Calf, Wolf, Ocelot, Cat, Kitten
+ Patrol: Iron Golem
+ Follow: Iron Golem
+ Info: Player
+ Tame: Wolf, Ocelot
+ Stand: Wolf, Wolfling, Cat, Kitten
+ Sit: Wolf, Wolfling, Cat, Kitten
+ Milk: Cow
+ Shear: Sheep
+ Dye: Sheep, Lamb
+ Ignite: Creeper
+ Trade: Trader
- Now you can attack mobs located inside spider web
- Added several improvements to Inventory windows
- Improved items category highlight in the Craft window
- Now you can turn off shadows under mobs and players in Options to improve FPS performance
- Field of View option now works for Creative modes also
- Fixed display of the status effects icons in the Effect window
- Fixed bug when baby mobs disappear after feeding
- Fixed bug when Nausea effect crashed the Game

Great update with exciting new functionality and many requested amazing features. Update the Game today, tell all your friends and play together all day long!

- Added long awaited new HUGE feature – Enchanting! Enhance armor, tools, weapons, and other items, create unique inventory with new abilities and become real hero!
- Now you can pick up Private Chest using silk touch enchantment
- Now you can also repair damaged items
- Finally added Horse mob to the Game! Tame and ride a Horse to become even more powerful!
- You can protect your horse with any type of armor: leather, gold, iron, and diamond
- You can also able to spawn a horse with spawn egg
- Now you can dye ALL kinds of armor! Mix different colors to become unique!
- Furnace now have new recipes:
+ Redstone Ore Smelts TO: Redstone
+ Iron/Gold Helmet Smelts TO: Iron/Gold ingot
+ Iron/Gold Plate Smelts TO: Iron/Gold ingot
+ Iron/Gold Leggings Smelts TO: Iron/Gold ingot
+ Iron/Gold Boots Smelts TO: Iron/Gold ingot
+ Iron/Gold Horse Armor Smelts TO: Iron/Gold ingot
- Added new crafting recipes (contact our community and social media for details)
- New 3D model and animation of the player
- Updated visuals of skins in the following skin packs: Default, Achiever, Cartoon and Animal
- New Redstone Repeater item
- Added dynamic shadows for better rendering and visuals of the multiplayer worlds
- Many 3D performance and multiplayer improvements

Awesome update with many new features, bells and whistles and improvements. Update the Game today and tell all your friends to play together all day long!

- Added new cool items to the SHOP: Horse Spawn Egg, Horse Armor and Horse Saddle
- Now you can ride a Horse in Creative Mode
- Now you can break and pick up your Private Chest faster
- Updated and improved 3D models of the Armor for players, zombies, baby zombies and skeletons
- Added new block: Sponge
- Improved colors in the Inventory window
- Improved Family and Achiever skin packs
- Updated icons for buckets of lava and water in Creative Mode
- Improved icon for Enchanted Apple item in Survival Mode
- Fixed UI problem when using Enchanting Apple and Armor at the same time
- Fixed Horse-riding issues when player is located on the maximum height
- Fixed problems with View Distance change
- Fixed problems with private messages notifications and adding other players to Friends List
- Fixed animation of potions drinking
- Implemented various UI improvements and fixes
- 3D rendering speed improvement

New Year and Christmas update with many holiday perks and tweaks!

Download Planet of Cubes and invite all your friends to celebrate festive season together:

- Added ability to craft a boat and use it for transportation on the water. You can also quickly buy the boat in the game shop
- Improved AI for aggressive mobs in Survival Multiplayer mode
- Added display count of the players online for every game mode
- Added cool and fun Christmas decorations for many mobs
- Updated Spawn Zones with Christmas and New Year theme
- Modified default texture pack to create Christmas and New Year atmosphere across the entire game!
- Added festive graphical elements to the UI
- Added “Christmas” section to the shop with huge discounts on Christmas related items limited time!
- Updated 3D model of the ostrich mob
- Added screen safe area support for devices with elements like notches and hole punches
- Improve usability of buttons for closing chest, craft, inventory, and other windows
- Implemented various UI improvements and fixes
- 3D rendering speed improvement

- Improved Hide N Seek mode gameplay and fixed numerous problems for seekers and hiders
- Added levels to the mobs inside Mansions. Every floor has different level of the mobs inside Mansions. New Mansions will be available soon after this update on the server

- Now thorns enchantment should cause maximum of 4 damage levels
